thread.section_title: Humura Resorts - UPDATED 2017 Resort Reviews & Price Comparison (Kampala, Uganda) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Excellent location , Great service
thread.title_full: Excellent location , Great service - Review of Humura Resorts, Kampala, Uganda - TripAdvisor

author: EKamaara
title: Excellent location , Great service
text:
This hotel is located in an ideal setting - one feels secure and comfortable. It is located at a comfortable distance to Acacia mall, Uganda Museum, the famous Mulago hospital. Makerere University and other exciting places. The staff is hospitable and friendly. And the rooms are quiet.
Room Tip: Floors under ground level are quieter See more room tips
